TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Justinian's Ambitions:[COLOR_REVERT] Own at least 6 cities in Calabria, Apulia, Dalmatia, Verona, Lombardy, Liguria, Tuscany, Latium, Corsica, Sardinia, Sicily, Tripolitania and Ifriqiya provinces in 632AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Justinian's Ambitions:[COLOR_REVERT] Own at least 6 cities in Calabria, Apulia, Dalmatia, Verona, Lombardy, Liguria, Tuscany, Latium, Corsica, Sardinia, Sicily, Tripolitania and Ifriqiya provinces in 632AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Justinian's Ambitions:[COLOR_REVERT] Own at least 6 cities in Calabria, Apulia, Dalmatia, Verona, Lombardy, Liguria, Tuscany, Latium, Corsica, Sardinia, Sicily, Tripolitania and Ifriqiya provinces in 632AD.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Reliving the Roman Glory:[COLOR_REVERT] Control the Balkans and Anatolia in 1282AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Reliving the Roman Glory:[COLOR_REVERT] Control the Balkans and Anatolia in 1282AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Wiederbelebung des Römischen Glanzes:[COLOR_REVERT] Behaltet oder erobert bis 1282 n.Chr. dem Balkan und Anatolien.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Rivivere la Gloria di Roma:[COLOR_REVERT] Mantieni o riconquista di nei Balcani e l'Anatolia nel 1282AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Reliving the Roman Glory:[COLOR_REVERT] Control the Balkans and Anatolia in 1282AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Revivendo a Glória Romana:[COLOR_REVERT] Mantenha ou reconquiste os Balcãs e Anatolia em 1282DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Second Rome:[COLOR_REVERT] Make Constantinople the largest and most cultured city while being the richest empire in the world in 1453AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Second Rome:[COLOR_REVERT] Make Constantinople the largest and most cultured city while being the richest empire in the world in 1453AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Second Rome:[COLOR_REVERT] Make Constantinople the largest and most cultured city while being the richest empire in the world in 1453AD.

TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Second Rome:[COLOR_REVERT] Make Constantinople the largest and most cultured city while being the richest empire in the world in 1453AD.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Bulgaria on Three Seas:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Moesia, Thrace, Macedonia, Serbia, Arberia, Thessaloniki and Constantinople by 917AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Bulgaria on Three Seas:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Moesia, Thrace, Macedonia, Serbia, Arberia, Thessaloniki and Constantinople by 917AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Bulgarien an Drei Meeren:[COLOR_REVERT] Erobert bis 917 n.Chr. Moesia, Thrace, Makedonien, Serbien, Arberia, Thessaloniki und Konstantinopel.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Bulgaria sui Tre Mari:[COLOR_REVERT] Controlla contemporaneamente le province di Moesia, Tracia, Macedonia, Serbia, Arberia, Salonicco e Costantinopoli entro il 917 n.Chr.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Bulgaria on Three Seas:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Moesia, Thrace, Macedonia, Serbia, Arberia, Thessaloniki and Constantinople by 917AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Bulgaria em Três Mares:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquiste Mésia, Trácia, Macedônia, Sérvia, Arberia, Thessalonica and Constantinopla até 917DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Beginning of the Renaissance:[COLOR_REVERT] Accumulate at least 100 Orthodox Faith Points by 1259AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Beginning of the Renaissance:[COLOR_REVERT] Accumulate at least 100 Orthodox Faith Points by 1259AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Der Beginn der Renaissance:[COLOR_REVERT] Sammelt bis 1259 n.Chr. mindestens 100 orthodoxe Glaubenspunkte.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]L'Inizio del Rinascimento:[COLOR_REVERT] Accumula almeno 100 Punti Fede Ortodossi entro il 1259AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Beginning of the Renaissance:[COLOR_REVERT] Accumulate at least 100 Orthodox Faith Points by 1259AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]O Começo da Renascença:[COLOR_REVERT] Acumule pelo menos 100 Pontos de Fé Ortodoxa até 1259DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Not Even the Birds Can Fly Through:[COLOR_REVERT] Do not lose a city to Barbarians, Mongols, Byzantines, or Ottomans before 1396AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Not Even the Birds Can Fly Through:[COLOR_REVERT] Ne perdre aucune ville par les Mongoles, les Byzantins ou les Ottomans avant 1396 ap.JC.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Nicht Einmal Vögel Können es Durchqueren:[COLOR_REVERT] Verliert vor 1396 n.Chr. keine Stadt an die Barbaren (Mongolen), die Byzantiner oder Osmanen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Neanche gli uccelli possono attraversare le nostre mura:[COLOR_REVERT] Non farti conquistare nessuna città da Mongoli (Barbari), Bizantini o Ottomani prima del 1396AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Not Even the Birds Can Fly Through:[COLOR_REVERT] Do not lose a city to barbarians (Mongols), Byzantines, or Ottomans before 1396AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Nem Mesmo os Pássaros Conseguem Passar:[COLOR_REVERT] Não perca cidades para os bárbaros (Mongóis), Bizantinos, ou Otomanos antes de 1396DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the West:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Ile-De-France, Normandy, Picardy, Aquitania, Provence, Burgundy, Orleans, Champagne, Lorraine, Catalonia, Lombardy, Tuscany, Swabia and Saxony by 840AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the West:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Ile-De-France, Normandy, Picardy, Aquitania, Provence, Burgundy, Orleans, Champagne, Lorraine, Catalonia, Lombardy, Tuscany, Swabia and Saxony by 840AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Imperium des Westens:[COLOR_REVERT] Erobert bis 840 n.Chr. Ile-De-France, Normandy, Picardie, Aquitanien, Provence, Burgund, Orleans, Champagne, Lothringen, Katalonien, Lombardei, Toskana, Schwaben und Sachsen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Impero Occidentale:[COLOR_REVERT] Controlla le province di Ile-De-France, Normandy, Piccardia, Aquitania, Provenza, Borgogna, Orleans, Champagne, Lorena , Catalogna, Lombardia, Toscana, Svevia e Sassonia nel 840AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the West:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Ile-De-France, Normandy, Picardy, Aquitania, Provence, Burgundy, Orleans, Champagne, Lorraine, Catalonia, Lombardy, Tuscany, Swabia and Saxony by 840AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Império do Oeste:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquiste Ilha de França, Normandy, Picardia, Aquitânia, Provença, Borgonha, Orleans, Champagne, Lorena, Catalunha, Lombardia, Toscana, Suábia e Saxônia até 840DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the Holy Land:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Jerusalem in 1291AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the Holy Land:[COLOR_REVERT] Capturer Jérusalem en 1291 ap.JC.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Imperium des Heiligen Landes:[COLOR_REVERT] Kontrolliert 1291 n.Chr. Jerusalem.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Impero della Terra Santa:[COLOR_REVERT] Controlla Gerusalemme nel 1291AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the Holy Land:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Jerusalem in 1291AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Império da Terra Santa:[COLOR_REVERT] Controle Jerusalém em 1291DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the World:[COLOR_REVERT] Build 5 Colonies.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the World:[COLOR_REVERT] Construire 5 Projets Coloniaux.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Imperium der Welt:[COLOR_REVERT] Errichtet 5 Kolonien.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Impero del Mondo:[COLOR_REVERT] Costruisci 5 Progetti Coloniali.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the World:[COLOR_REVERT] Build 5 Colonies.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Império do Mundo:[COLOR_REVERT] Construa 5 Projetos Coloniais.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Burgundian Way of Life:[COLOR_REVERT] Produce 12,000 culture points in your cities by 1336AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Burgundian Way of Life:[COLOR_REVERT] Produce 12,000 culture points by 1336AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Die Burgunder Art zu Leben:[COLOR_REVERT] Erzeugt bis 1336 n.Chr. 12.000 Kulturpunkte.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Lo Stile di Vita Borgognone:[COLOR_REVERT] Devi aver prodotto almeno 12,000 punti cultura entro il 1336AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Burgundian Way of Life:[COLOR_REVERT] Produce 12,000 culture points by 1336AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Estilo de vida Burgúndio:[COLOR_REVERT] Produza 12.000 pontos de cultura até 1336DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Reunification:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Burgundy, Provence, Picardy, Flanders, Champagne and Lorraine in 1376AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Reunification:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Burgundy, Provence, Picardy, Flanders, Champagne and Lorraine in 1376AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Wiedervereinigung:[COLOR_REVERT] Erobert bis 1376 n.Chr. Burgund, Provence, Picardie, Flandern, Champagne und Lothringen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Riunificazione:[COLOR_REVERT] Controlla le province di Borgogna, Provenza, Piccardia, Fiandre, Champagne e Lorena nel 1376AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Reunification:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Burgundy, Provence, Picardy, Flanders, Champagne and Lorraine in 1376AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Reunificação:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquiste Borgonha, Provença, Picardia, Flandres, Champagne e Lorena em 1376DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Western Power:[COLOR_REVERT] Have a higher score than France, England and Germany in 1473AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Western Power:[COLOR_REVERT] Have a higher score than France, England and Germany in 1473AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Die Macht im Westen:[COLOR_REVERT] Erreicht 1473 n.Chr. eine höhere Punktzahl als Frankreich, England und Deutschland.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]La Potenza dell'Occidente:[COLOR_REVERT] Devi avere il punteggio più alto di Francia, Inghilterra e Germania nel 1473AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Western Power:[COLOR_REVERT] Have a higher score than France, England and Germany in 1473AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]A Potência Ocidental:[COLOR_REVERT] Tenha uma colocação (score) melhor que França, Inglaterra e Alemanha em 1473DC.

TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Sword of Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Control all territories from Tunisia to Asia Minor in 850AD.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The House of Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Control the Levant and Egypt in 1291AD while being the most advanced civilization.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The House of Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Control the Levant and Egypt in 1291AD while being the most advanced civilization.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]The House of Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Control the Levant and Egypt in 1291AD while being the most advanced civilization.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The World of Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Spread Islam to at least 35% of the population of Europe.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The World of Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Répandre l'Islam à 35% dans le monde.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Die Welt des Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Sorgt für eine 35%-ige Verbreitung des Islam.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]La Spada dell'Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Diffondi l'Islam nel 35% delle città europee.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]The World of Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Islam to spread to 35% of all people.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]O Mundo do Islã:[COLOR_REVERT] Espalhe o Islã para 35% da população total.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Jewel of the World:[COLOR_REVERT] Make Cordoba the largest city in the world in 961AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Jewel of the World:[COLOR_REVERT] Faire de Courdoue la ville la plus peuplée du monde en 961 ap.JC.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Juwel der Welt:[COLOR_REVERT] Macht Cordoba 961 n.Chr. zur größten Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Gioiello del Mondo:[COLOR_REVERT] Cordoba deve essere la città più grande del mondo nel 961AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Jewel of the World:[COLOR_REVERT] Make Cordoba the largest city in the world in 961AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]A Jóia do Mundo:[COLOR_REVERT] Faça Córdoba ser a cidade mais populosa do mundo em 961DC

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Superior Moorish Architecture:[COLOR_REVERT] Build the Alhambra, the Gardens of Al-Andalus, and La Mezquita by 1309AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Superior Moorish Architecture:[COLOR_REVERT] Construire l'Alhambra, les Jardins d'Al-Andalus et La Mezquita en 1309 ap.JC.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Die Überragende Architektur der Mauren:[COLOR_REVERT] Errichtet bis 1309 n.Chr. die Wunder Alhambra, die Gärten von Al-Andalus und Mezquita-Catedral.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]La Superiorità dell'Architettura Moresca:[COLOR_REVERT] Costruisci l'Alhambra, i Giardini di Al-Andalus e La Mezquita entro il 1309AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Superior Moorish Architecture:[COLOR_REVERT] Build the Alhambra, the Gardens of Al-Andalus, and La Mezquita by 1309AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]A Arquiteture Superior Moura:[COLOR_REVERT] Construa Alhambra, os Jardins de Al-Andalus, e La Mezquita até 1309DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Ummah of Iberia:[COLOR_REVERT] Make sure Islam is present in every city in the Iberian peninsula in 1492AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Ummah of Iberia:[COLOR_REVERT] Assurez-vous que l'Islam soit présent dans chaque ville de la pénisule ibérique en 1492 ap.JC.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Ummah von Iberien:[COLOR_REVERT] Verbreitet bis 1492 n.Chr. den Islam in allen Städten in die Iberische Halbinsel.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Ummah d'Iberia:[COLOR_REVERT] L'Islam deve essere presente in ogni città nelle province della Penisola iberica nel 1492AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Ummah of Iberia:[COLOR_REVERT] Make sure Islam is present in every city in the Iberian peninsula in 1492AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Ummah da Ibéria:[COLOR_REVERT] Garanta a presença do Islã em todas cidades em Península Ibérica em 1492DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Reconquista:[COLOR_REVERT] Make sure Catholicism is the only religion present in every city in the Iberian peninsula in 1492AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Reconquista:[COLOR_REVERT] Assurez-vous que le catholicisme soit l'unique religion présente dans chaqu'une des villes de la pénisule ibérique en 1492 ap.JC.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Die Reconquista:[COLOR_REVERT] Macht Katholizismus zur alleinigen Religion auf der Iberischen Halbinsel und verbreitet bis 1492 n.Chr. den katholischen Glauben in allen Städten in die Iberische Halbinsel.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]La Reconquista:[COLOR_REVERT] Rendi il Cattolicesimo l'unica religione presente nella penisola Iberica, e diffondilo in tutte le città delle province della Penisola iberica nel 1492AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Reconquista:[COLOR_REVERT] Make sure Catholicism is the only religion present in every city in the Iberian peninsula in 1492AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]A Reconquista:[COLOR_REVERT] Faça do Catolicismo a única religião presente na Península Ibérica, e espalhe o catolicismo para todas as cidades em Península Ibérica em 1492DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Spanish Armada:[COLOR_REVERT] Have more Colonies than any other nation in 1588AD, while having at least 3.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Spanish Armada:[COLOR_REVERT] Etre la civilisation avec le plus de colonies en 1588 ap.JC. (tout en ayant au moins 3).
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Die Spanische Armada:[COLOR_REVERT] Besitzt 1588 n.Chr. die meisten Kolonien (mit mindestens 3).
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]L'Invincibile Armada:[COLOR_REVERT] Devi avere più colonie di tutti nel 1588AD (avendo almeno 3).
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Spanish Armada:[COLOR_REVERT] Have most Colonies in 1588AD (teniendo al menos 3).
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]A Armada Espanhola:[COLOR_REVERT] Tenha mais colônias que qualquer outro em 1588DC (enquanto tem pelo menos 3).

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Defender of Catholic Europe:[COLOR_REVERT] Ensure that Catholic nations have more population and more land than any other religion in 1648AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Defender of Catholic Europe:[COLOR_REVERT] Assurez-vous que les nations catholiques soient les plus peuplées et celles avec le plus de territoires en 1648 ap.JC.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Verteidiger des katholischen Europas:[COLOR_REVERT] Stellt sicher dass 1648 n.Chr. die katholischen Nationen eine größere Bevölkerung und mehr Land besitzen als irgendeine andere Religion.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Difensore dell'Europa Cattolica:[COLOR_REVERT] Assicurati che le nazioni Cattoliche abbiano più popolazione e più territorio complessivi di ogni altra religione nel 1648AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Defender of Catholic Europe:[COLOR_REVERT] Ensure that the Catholic nations have more population and more land than any other religion in 1648AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Defensor da Europa Católica:[COLOR_REVERT] Assegure que as nações católicas tenham mais população e território que qualquer outra religião em 1648DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Domination of the Adriatic Sea:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Verona, Dalmatia, Arberia and Epirus by 1004AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Domination of the Adriatic Sea:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Verona, Dalmatia, Arberia and Epirus by 1004AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Dominanz der Adria:[COLOR_REVERT] Erobert bis 1004 n.Chr. Verona, Dalmatien, Arberia und Epirus.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_YELLOW]Dominio sull'Adriatico:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquista le provincie di Veneto, Dalmazia, Arberia ed Epiro entro il 1004AD.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_YELLOW]Domination of the Adriatic Sea:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Verona, Dalmatia, Arberia and Epirus by 1004AD.
TEXT.Portuguese: [COLOR_YELLOW]Dominação do Mar Adriático:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquiste Verona, Dalmácia, Arberia e Épiro até 1004DC.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Domination of the Mediterranean Sea:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Constantinople, Thessaly, Morea, Crete and Cyprus by 1204AD.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_YELLOW]Domination of the Mediterranean Sea:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Constantinople, Thessaly, Morea, Crete and Cyprus by 1204AD.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_YELLOW]Domination of the Mediterranean Sea:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Constantinople, Thessaly, Morea, Crete and Cyprus by 1204AD.

TEXT.English: You gain Viking Points from conquering cities (+1 point per population), pillaging improvements (+1 point) and sinking ships (+2 points).
TEXT.French: You gain points from conquering cities (+1pt per population), pillaging improvements (+1pt) and sinking ships (+2pts).
TEXT.German: Punkte erhaltet ihr durch Stadteroberungen (+1pt pro Bevölkerung), Plündern von Verbesserungen (+1pt) und Versenken von Schiffen (+2pts).
TEXT.Italian: Guadagni punti conquistando città (+1pt per abitante), distruggendo miglioramenti (+1pt) e affondando navi (+2pts).
TEXT.Spanish: You gain points from conquering cities (+1pt per population), pillaging improvements (+1pt) and sinking ships (+2pts).
TEXT.Portuguese: Você ganha pontos por conquistar cidades (+1pt por população), pilhagem de melhorias (+1pt) e afundando navios (+2pts).

TEXT.English: You gain Attitude Points in each turn for good relations (max 3), open borders (1), defensive pact (2), sharing a religion (1), imports and exports (1/2 per resource), common wars (2 per war). Bad relations, war with France, or having a different State Religion will seriously hurt your progress!
TEXT.French: You gain Attitude Points in each turn for good relations (max 3), open borders (1), defensive pact (2), sharing a religion (1), imports and exports (1/2 per resource), common wars (2 per war). Bad relations, war with France, or having a different State Religion will seriously hurt your progress!
TEXT.German: You gain Attitude Points in each turn for good relations (max 3), open borders (1), defensive pact (2), sharing a religion (1), imports and exports (1/2 per resource), common wars (2 per war). Bad relations, war with France, or having a different State Religion will seriously hurt your progress!
TEXT.Italian: You gain Attitude Points in each turn for good relations (max 3), open borders (1), defensive pact (2), sharing a religion (1), imports and exports (1/2 per resource), common wars (2 per war). Bad relations, war with France, or having a different State Religion will seriously hurt your progress!
TEXT.Spanish: You gain Attitude Points in each turn for good relations (max 3), open borders (1), defensive pact (2), sharing a religion (1), imports and exports (1/2 per resource), common wars (2 per war). Bad relations, war with France, or having a different State Religion will seriously hurt your progress!
TEXT.Portuguese: You gain Attitude Points in each turn for good relations (max 3), open borders (1), defensive pact (2), sharing a religion (1), imports and exports (1/2 per resource), common wars (2 per war). Bad relations, war with France, or having a different State Religion will seriously hurt your progress!
